Umbrella: An umbrella with a built-in solar panel that can charge your phone or other electronic devices.
Smart Umbrella: An umbrella with a built-in GPS tracker, so you can easily find it if you lose it.
Self-Inflating Umbrella: An umbrella that automatically inflates when opened, making it easy to use and store.
Transparent Umbrella: An umbrella made of transparent material, allowing you to see through it and blend in with your surroundings.
Umbrella with Built-In Fan: An umbrella with a built-in fan that can help cool you down on hot days.
